TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Official Chat Room Statistics.

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program Official Chat Room Statistics.

This site is not affiliated with Squad in any way.

www.fractalscapes.net/ksp/stats/stats_main.html

These statistics reflect from about October of last year to early April of this year.

Statistics where collected based on one channel log file from one user, so they may not reflect an entirely accurate picture of channel activities and times.

The log file that was used is just about enough to get the ball rolling on the long term statistics for the channel. I shall update these stats fairly regularly with more complete logs for short term stats and find someone with a complete log file going back as far as the channel was created for long term stats. So the stats you see now will eventually start to reflect a more accurate picture of channel activities.

The statistics features a few pages which you can navigate using the menus just under the logo at the top of the page, or the same links at the very bottom of each page.

The Main Page features general user counts, time of day tables, and various graphs.

The Second Page is a more detailed general statistics page.

The other pages Ã¢â‚¬Å“Word WatchÃ¢â‚¬Â feature specific chat trends such as what popular mods and links have been talked about and by whom ..etc

These Ã¢â‚¬Å“Word WatchÃ¢â‚¬Â pages may in the future change depending on what the general trends are in the chat room.

SOME NOTES

Not all peoples avatars are currently displayed, this is simply due to me being unable to find avatars for many of the people from the KSP forum. I realize also many people lost their accounts recently, including myself.. so if anyone at all wants their avatar featured on the stats for future updates please donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t hesitate to ask me either here or in the chat room Ã¢â‚¬Å“TMAÃ¢â‚¬Â. Avatars donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t necessarily have to be the same as the forum but would be preferable, however if you want to use some other one thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fine. The page stats will feature 150x150 big + 15x15 small avatars.. there is no limit on file size since I will be putting any submitted images into its own Ã¢â‚¬Å“rounded edgeÃ¢â‚¬Â frame avatars.

People will also have the option to have other information along with their nick on the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Personal StatsÃ¢â‚¬Â table (top of page 2), assuming that person features in the top10 list.

I may at some point make this Ã¢â‚¬Å“Personal StatsÃ¢â‚¬Â table, 20 or even 30 nicks long.

If you also want other information along with your nick on that section the options are: Website Address, Location, Date of Birth, Gender & Team/Group.

I may also give people the option to put their own banners if they are featured on the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Personal StatsÃ¢â‚¬Â table.

This will also help to create a more interesting statistics for the channel, so the more people that fill in some of these details the better.

I am also considering giving people the option to suggest custom Ã¢â‚¬Å“Word WatchÃ¢â‚¬Â pages for future updates so if any of you at any time think of interesting, useful or even amusing word watches tables or pages donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t hesitate to reply on this thread, private me on the forum or catch me in the chatroom.

As mentioned in my opening, eventually I will have another page that will be short term statistics, this will feature channel activities over a week or two, the long terms stats might be updated every month or two.

A FINAL NOTE ON THE STATS AS THEY ARE NOW (20th April 2013)

Its important to stress the stats as they are now are from one personÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s log file. There will be many of you that have been quite active in the channel that will have not been featured much on the stats pages. This is due to the fact that the person that was logging the room was not necessarily online all the time, so missed quite a lot of chat, and also at generally specific times of the day. So there will be many people and chat activity that ought to be reflected that are not.

However I myself have started logging the channel so for the next updates (at least short term stats Ã¢â‚¬â€œ building up to long-term) the stats will be more accurate.

I would like to take this opportunity to ask anyone at all that has been in the chat room for a significant amount of time to give me logs from that period. It doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t matter if you where not online for all of it, but in a nut shell an ideal log(s) would be from a user that is there all the time, and idles when not chatting.

If anyone could help me out with that it would be fantastic.

A big tanks to Ted for the general help, Smite for the help with setting up the nick configurations and KSP for the anim gifs and still for logo.. and last but not least everybody in #KSPOfficial for all the chat

Enjoy all & keep chatting

Regards

tma
